data.Title: Google Search Updates
data.Description: Google has announced a new core update is expected in the coming weeks. The last core update was the March 2024 core update, and many sites are still waiting since September 2023 to see helpful content recoveries.

data.Title: Google Search Notes Discontinued
data.Description: Google is ending its experiment with Notes on Search. The feature, which was part of Google Search Labs, allowed users to add notes to search results. Google says that it has seen in its research that people want to hear from others like them and Notes was an exploration into that.

data.Title: Google Testing AI Overviews on Workspace Accounts
data.Description: Google is testing AI Overviews on Workspace accounts (also in the UK)

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Chat Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google Business Profiles' new chat feature is no longer working. Users are reporting that they are unable to start new chats. Google has not yet commented on the issue.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Rollout
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now rolling out to all merchants this month

data.Title: Google's Privacy Sandbox Raises Concerns
data.Description: Google's Privacy Sandbox outage sparks contractual concerns since its terms of service leave users footing the bill even when it doesn't work.

data.Title: Taboola Partners with Apple News
data.Description: Taboola has struck a deal with Apple to power native advertising within the Apple News and Apple Stocks apps. Taboola's CEO says the deal is a "major milestone" for the company.

data.Title: AI's Impact on SEO
data.Description: This article explores how AI has transformed search engine algorithms and SEO practices, including its impact on keyword research and content creation.

data.Title: Bing's Index Crucial for Future SEO
data.Description: Bing's index is crucial in the future of SEO, not because of Bing the search engine, but because Bing's index now also powers ChatGPT (and thus, soon Apple's Siri), Meta AI, LinkedIn AI and Microsoft Copilot.
